name: Ping Pong Chaos
description:
Ping Pong Chaos is a chaotic two button local multiplayer game. Challenge your friends side by side or play the computer in an intense ping pong match. Endure challenging customizations and make your own customization playlist. Create a tournament with up to 8 friends or play the computer in tournament mode.

How to play:
Tap the jump buttons to leap left and right. Hold the jump buttons after hitting the ball to add spin.
